title: net/rpc: documentation error: example of async client call has the wrong type for reply parameter
body:
by **skip.tavakkolian**: 
This line in net/rpc comment/documentation has an error:
src/pkg/net/rcp/server.go:115

I believe the reply parameter should be "quotient" not
"&quotient". "quotient" is a new-ed Quotient.

Thanks,
-Skip

What steps will reproduce the problem?
If possible, include a link to a program on play.golang.org.
